title: How To Liv
description: A chance encounter can change everything.Olivia Moore is your average hard working, down to earth, Aussie chick.Taking each day as it comes, working in a factory, Olivia is just plodding along through life. She’s resigned herself to the fact she’s not going to get her happily ever after, a husband… kids… because she has given up on men - they lie and cheat, leaving a world of pain in their wake. Then Olivia meets Joel.Joel Turner is hard working, down to earth, sexy, kind, fun… in fact, he’s damn near perfect. Joel is exactly the type of man Olivia has always wanted. He stirs emotions in her that have laid dormant for years. He breaks down her walls, forcing Olivia to fall in love and to finally believe fairy tales really can come true.Until she discovers something that could change it all.Note: For Mature 18+ readers, contains explicit sex scenes.
author: Megan Keith
